name: Pathshala
author: emazharulislam

sections.description:
This is the initial release of the plugin. We are working on the next complete release. Hopefully, the next release will be available very soon and you will be amazed.

Features – Pathshala eLearning Management Solution

  • Fully Responsive
  • Cross Browsers support ( Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera )
  • SEO Friendly & Compatible with SEO plugins.
  • Course categories
  • Course tags

Extensions

We’re currently working on improving our core plugin. We have the plan for creating Extensions to add functionality and improve the user experience.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Pathshala has been developed to be really simple to use and requires little configuration and setting changes to start creating & managing courses.

  1. Either download the plugin directly from your WordPress admin or upload the .zip file.
  2. Click install, once installed, activate and you’re done!

Once installed and activated you’ll find a new “courses” item in your admin menu.

What are the requirements to use Pathshala?

You only need to have at least 4.4 or higher version of WordPress on your website.

short_description: License: GPLv2 or later License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html Pathshala is a complete eLearning management solution for WordPress.
